display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 512px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Convert utf-8 to ascii.
2. Remove stopwords.
3. Remove contraction mappings.
4. Remove punctuations.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 228px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 391px;

div.div: Make a copy of data in 'corpus' variable

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 201px;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 365px; margin-left: 198px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Get words in corpus.
2. Extract unique words.
3. Sort unique words alphabetically.
4. Create feature vector as a dictionary.
5. Get frequency counts.
6. Compute TF.
7. Compute IDF.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 194px; height: 1px; padding-top: 590px; margin-left: 1px;

text-align: left
text-align: left
div.span: 2. Convert TF_IDF matrix into a sparse matrix (optional).

div.div:
1. Sum up the TF_IDF scores for all words in the each sentence as sentence score.
2. Divide the sentence score of each sentence by sentence length.

switch.text: 1. Sum up the TF_IDF scores for all words...

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Use average value of sentence scores as threshold.
2. In order of original corpus, append each sentence to summary :
if sentence_score>=threshold.
3. Print the summary.

switch.text: 1. Use average value of sentence scores as thresh...
